title: ABB & Google Cloud Hackathon
description: Placed at second place in a three day hackathon, held at Google Zurich headquarters. Used Vertex AI, Looker Studio and BigQuery tables for developing a cloud web app for monitoring and doing predictive maintenance of a motor pool.

title: Drone Control with Pose Estimation
description: Developed software for controlling a DJITello drone through facial and human poses recognition, framed by drone camera. Modified a pose estimation library that uses pretrained gpu computer visions models for correctly estimating human faces even in dark conditions.
